channel.title: How to annoy the teachers easily
channel.description: if your school computers have windows xp on them, you can press alt + shift + printscreen and it will change the definition, making it all black and big. i did this and the teachers went crazy :)

item.title: How to annoy the teachers easily
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

dark_child:

lol, or you can just turn the switch off, i turned it off and one computer turned off and all the others froze lol

Like the switch to the surge protector?

Read full topic

item.title: How to annoy the teachers easily
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:10, topic:114874”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=164076.msg1633475#msg1633475 date=1185636922]
ALT + SHIFT + PRNT SCRN is high contrast, which is fast but downright ugly. This guide is useless. Just call her names and start runnng.
[/quote]

Fast?[/quote]
huh?

Oh, high contrast gives good speed but ugly, like windows classic.

item.title: How to annoy the teachers easily
item.dc:creator: @beegee7730 beegee7730
item.description:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:3, topic:114874”][quote author=raindropsc link=topic=164076.msg1535011#msg1535011 date=1182588163]
and how do you suppose you reverse it?
[/quote]

Sounds like someone did it on their home computer.

Just hit it again. And yea my teachers couldn’t care less about what the computers look like. If you want to piss them off, give them a blowjob, then sue them for child molestation.[/quote]
nah, look at michael jackson. he got away with it.
